title: Sergei Varfolomeyev
text:
Sergei Nikolayevich Varfolomeyev (; born 27 February 1968 in <a href="Leningrad">Leningrad</a>) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
He is the older brother of <a href="Dmitri%20Varfolomeyev%20%28footballer%2C%20born%201978%29">Dmitri Varfolomeyev</a>.
